titles: The frame of the government of the province of Pennsilvania in America together with certain laws agreed upon in England by the governour and divers free-men of the aforesaid province : to be further explained and confirmed there by the first provincial council and General Assembly that shall be held, if they see meet.
author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.
notes: The preface and the "Frame of government" are signed: William Penn.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Pennsylvania --  Politics and government --  Colonial period, ca. 1660-1775.
